P2PBiometricsTerms.bodyText:
To identify yourself, you need to follow the following digital procedure:

• Find suitable proof of identity and attach it
• Take a photo (selfie)
• Take video
 The photo & video will be used to verify your identity.
P2PBiometricsTerms.checkBoxText: I have been informed and I consent to the use of my biometric data related to my facial image, for the purpose of identifying and verifying my identity

NeoBiometricsTerms.bodyText:
The process is very simple and easy: all you need to do is find a well-lit spot to photograph your proof of identity and take a selfie.

 Don't worry, you're in good hands, your details are safe.
NeoBiometricsTerms.checkBoxText: I have been informed and I consent to the use of my data for the purposes of identifying and verifying my details.

ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationTitle3: Insert SIM card into USB Stick
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationTitle5: Connect the USB to the router
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationTitle7: Confirm that the USB light is on
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationTitle8: Confirm that the router is working properly
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText1: Make sure you have the USB Stick and the special SIM card necessary for the installation process
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText2: Remove the protection cap of the USB Stick, then slide the front cover down, as indicated by the arrows.
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText3:
Insert the special SIM card, which does not require a PIN code, into the corresponding slot on the USB Stick.

CAUTION: The oblique edge of the SIM card should align correctly with the corresponding edge of the SIM card slot.
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText4: Replace the front cover, dragging it up, in the direction indicated by the arrow, until it returns to its original position.
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText5:
Insert the USB Stick into the corresponding port of your Landline router.

The COSMOTE Internet Backup service will be ready for use in less than one (1) minute, as soon as the USB Stick light starts flashing (1) every two (2) seconds.


*The actual model of your router may be different from the one shown in the picture.
**The color of the USB Stick light indicates the COSMOTE Mobile network to which you have connected (Light Blue: 4G, Blue: 3G, Green: 2G).
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText6:
Discontinue broadband access over a Fixed network by removing the supply cable "DSL" from the router port with the corresponding indication.


*The location of the port "DSL" depends on the model of router you have.
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText7:
After two (2) minutes, confirm the restoration of broadband access over the Mobile network. The bright light of the USB Stick, in this case, will be solidly lit.


*The colour indicator of the lamp shall be indicative.
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText8:
After two (2) minutes, confirm the smooth operation of your services, through the lights of your router.

On the router in the image, the "Online" & "Telephony" lights will come back and remain solidly lit.


*During the operation of the COSMOTE Internet Backup service and depending on the router model that you have, the light indicating the provision of broadband access over a Landline network will be off or blinking.
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText9: After confirming the operation of the service, reconnect the "DSL" supply cable to the router in order to restore broadband access over a Fixed network. In this case, the lights of the router will come back and remain solid.
ibuInstallationInfo.ibuInstallationText10: You have completed all the steps to install COSMOTE Internet Backup!

ibuOfferBannerModel.title: Never run out of Internet access!

f2rInfo.routerConnect1: Follow the steps below. (Applies to broadband connections)
f2rInfo.routerConnect2: Connect the telephone branch (T) to the telephone socket and filter to one of its two ports.
f2rInfo.routerConnect3: Connect your telephone device to the filter port.
f2rInfo.routerConnect4: Connect one end of the blue telephone cable to one of the two ports of the telephone branch and its other end to the blue port of the splitter marked "LINE".
f2rInfo.routerConnect5: Connect one end of the gray telephone cable to the port of the splitter that reads MODEM (gray port) and its other end to the DSL port on the back of the router.
f2rInfo.routerConnect6: Connect one end of the black telephone cable to the port of the splitter that reads PHONE (black port) and its other end to the back of the router on the Phone 2.
f2rInfo.routerConnect7: Connect the power supply to the Power port (black port) on the back of the equipment (router) and the other end to a power outlet.
f2rInfo.meshConnect1: Speed Home WiFi extends the range of the WiFi network by achieving uninterrupted WiFi in all areas of your home. Follow the steps to connect it to your Speedport Smart and find the optimal location to install it.
f2rInfo.meshConnect2: Plug in the power outlet the Speed Home WiFi, which should be up to 2 meters from the Speedport Smart, without any obstruction, and activate it from the ON/OFF option.
f2rInfo.meshConnect3: Wait until the Status and Signal lights stay on.
f2rInfo.meshConnect4: Press WPS on the back of the Speed Home WiFi and then the Register/WPS of the router. Register/WPS on Speedport Smart and Mesh and Repeater on Speed Home WiFi will start flashing.
f2rInfo.meshConnect5: When all indicators are stabilized, the connection is complete. If the Signal indicator starts flashing, then a software upgrade is performed. It will restart and then all the indicators will light up steadily.
f2rInfo.meshConnect6: The optimal location is usually halfway between Speedport Smart and the area with poor coverage. Follow the next steps to find the optimal location of Speed Home WiFi in your home.
f2rInfo.meshConnect7:
To find the optimal position:
1. Unplug your Speed Home WiFi from the wall outlet.
2. Connect your phone to the WiFi of the Speedport Smart.
3. Select "Search for optimal location" to start the process.
f2rInfo.wifiProblem1: All models of equipment (router) are set to have the maximum wireless transmission range. However, with the following instructions you can improve the wireless download quality for your home and you may find the solution you need.
f2rInfo.wifiProblem2: Place the router in a central telephone socket in your area, so that it is at the shortest possible distance from your devices (laptop, tablet, mobile phone).
f2rInfo.wifiProblem3: Remove, if available, a wireless broadcast source (e.g. the base of the cordless phone, Bluetooth speaker, wireless controllers, baby monitors, microwave) more than 1.5 meters away as electromagnetic interference is likely to occur.
f2rInfo.wifiProblem4: It is advisable not to place the router in a closet or loft, but in some open place on the site. Avoid placing it next to an aquarium or on metal surfaces and mirrors, materials that reflect radio waves and reduce its range.
f2rInfo.wifiProblem5: If you haven't found the solution you need, below you can find more options.

portIn.title: Get the new digital mobile plan, COSMOTE Neo, by following these simple steps:

steps.text: Shape your plan the way you want.
Fill in your e-mail.
You can identify your data online, easily and simply, from your mobile phone.
Get your new SIM card and activate it.
Start communicating, in your own unique way!

neoInfoScreen.title: The 100% digital mobile plan in Greece.

steps.text: Get away with really lots of data.
Customize it, however you want, according to your needs.
cancel it at any time, without no commitment.
Manage it exclusively from your mobile.
Have you got it yet??

HAS_NOT_RECHARGED.reasonDescription: For activation to take place, you'll need to do top-up.

REACHED_ACTIVE_LIMIT.reasonDescription: You have already activated the service.

TOO_MANY_PROVISIONED_BUNDLES.reasonDescription: You will be able to turn it back on, starting on the 1st of the following month.

REACHED_ACTIVE_LIMIT_MULTIPLE.reasonDescription: You have reached the roaming packet limit. You can have up to 4 packages activated.

TOO_MANY_PROVISIONED_BUNDLES_DATAMENOW.reasonDescription: You will be able to turn it back on, starting on the 1st of next month.

REACHED_ACTIVE_LIMIT_DATAMENOW.reasonDescription: The service cannot be activated at this time.
